# Visualization of Connectome

```{r}
fly <- read_graph(file='../data/fly_mushroom.graphml', format="graphml")
fly.mtx <- as_adjacency_matrix(fly, type="both", sparse=FALSE)
rownames(fly.mtx) <- c()
colnames(fly.mtx) <- c()
gs.plot.plot_matrix(fly.mtx)
```
